resources.string: They’ll allow Prey to protect your phone and help you control it if it ever gets lost or stolen. Your information and privacy are safe with us.

Prey utilizes the Device Administrator permission for its Remote Wipe and Lock features.\nGranting permission allows you to activate our data protection tools remotely to counter data theft.\nThe Remote Wipe lets you execute a data wipe on a lost device, while our Lock feature blocks access to it with a lock screen and a custom password.
What can Prey do for you...
For your safety, enter your password, to manage device settings.
DOWNLOAD PREY ON THE DEVICES YOU WANT TO PROTECT.
It works on all major operating systems, so it lets you keep track and trigger actions on all your devices from your Prey account.

Once remotely triggered from your Prey account, your device will gather and deliver detailed evidence back to you, including a picture of who\'s using it — often the crucial piece of data that police officers need to take action.
Use Prey to fully lock down your devices and delete your stored passwords, to ensure that no one will have access to your private stuff. All this while consuming minimal battery life.
Sensitive data is gathered only when you request it, and is for your eyes only ‐ nothing is sent without your permission. You can always check our source code if you want to make sure.
DON\’T TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT
I\’m euphoric and laughing with excitement that this actually worked.
FREE WITH NO GIMMICKS, PLANS FOR EXTENDED PROTECTION
Prey is completely free of charge for as long as you want to. We also have some great plans with extra features!
It seems you\'ve been using Prey for a while now. Would you tell us what you think about it?
What would you change about Prey if you could?
Deletes this device from your Prey account
Your device will be detached from the Control Panel. This will also delete all its stored reports.\n\nAre you sure?
Prevents your device from being turned off manually. Upon using the OFF button it will request your Prey PIN. A notification is shown due to Android policies
Your device can\'t be turned off if its screen is locked
How often Prey will run if no Google Services are available
Passwords must be at least 6 characters
By clicking \'Yes\' you will revoke Prey administration privileges on this device. Without these privileges, Prey won\'t be able to erase remotely.\nAre you sure?
Your Prey password was successfully changed
You\'re about to grant Prey special security privileges, that will allow you to remotely lock your device.\nClick Yes to continue.
These privileges are needed to remotely lockdown your device, and will prevent Prey from being uninstalled. You need to revoke these rights later if you wish to uninstall Prey.
You have successfully associated this device with your Prey account. Now take a minute to set it up.
Check your settings and try again.
We couldn\'t reach our servers due to a connection error. please ensure you have a stable connection.
Can\'t add this device to your prey account. Please check again the email and password provided. %s
Can\'t change password. The current password entered is invalid.
Can\'t report forgotten password. Please try again later.
Email length must be between %1$s and %2$s characters.
Password length must be between %1$s and %2$s characters.
Attaching device to account…\nJust a sec!
You\'ve reached your free account\'s device limit. Delete one to make room or consider one of our paid plans for more device slots and extra features: https://www.preyproject.com/pricing
You\'ve successfully installed Prey on your device. To finish the setup process you need to verify your email address by following the link we just sent to %s.
Geofence service is not available now
Your app has registered too many geofences
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call
Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now
Do you already have an account? Log in
Ashley uses Prey on all her devices: her Macbook, her Android phone and tablet. But one day, she was at the wrong place at the wrong time and someone stole her tablet.
Meet Steve, he steals objects left unattended.
Losing a device means losing precious data, memories, information and some really expensive equipment.

Without him knowing it, Prey is silently capturing pictures, location, and sending the legitimate owner complete reports.\nAshley can also use Prey to remotely lock her device down and wipe her sensitive data.
Good thing Ashley has PREY activated! She just got the reports from her stolen device, so now the police has accurate evidence to work with.
With the detailed reports on the missing device, Ashley had more worries, she got her device back.
Don\'t wait for the worst to happen to take action. Sign up, enter your registration details and set up Prey on your phone.
Create your 4 digit PIN code to activate the use the OFF Button Lock feature
This PIN number will be requested when using the OFF button
It allows execute actions on your device remotely by sending instructions via a text message
Send a text message to your phone with the command you need and action is activated on your device
Will return the device’s geolocation via SMS to phone_number
Will lock the device’s screen until lock_PIN is entered.
Will force unlock your device’s screen. It’s perfect for forgotten passwords!
Will show some_text as a system notification
Will erase all your data from your phone, performing a “factory reset”. This is specially useful to protect your private information, but could render Prey useless. Use with caution!
Gets the location of your device when the battery low
Prey requires multiple privileges from Android to work at maximum capacity, these are:

Device Administrator
It allows the use of two tools. The Remote Wipe, to delete data and protect your privacy, and the Remote Lock that blocks access to the device.

Access to camera, location, and state
Utilized in Prey’s tracking and in the generation of Evidence Reports, which include location, pictures, and local device information.

Permission to draw over other apps
Enables Prey’s screen lock to overlay above the phone’s interface and other apps, making the lock more robust by avoiding user navigation.

Access to contacts and calls
Prey uses this permission because it also provides access to the device’s IMEI, which we deliver to our users as info, it doesn’t utilize contacts or calls in any way.

Access to media and local files
Permits the use of our remote File Retrieval and Wipe features, utilized to save documents on lost devices and to wipe their data clean.
You need to activate all location sources \"Settings Location\" to get your location
There is a new version available. Do you want to update?
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Click "Read Barcode" to read a barcode
Visit panel.preyproject.com/qr\n on your computer an scan the QR code
Prey needs new permissions to guard this device
Take advantage of Prey’s new remote lock for Android 7.
New permissions for a fortified lock!

Prey’s improved lock for Android 7 now protects your device from being turned off and blocks access to the status bar. You’ll be asked to enable Prey to “draw over other apps” on the following menu to activate this feature.
The device has been blocked by its owner to protect both privacy and property.\n\nEnter the password to unlock.
I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
I confirm that I am over 16 years old
I want to receive emails regarding offers and promotions from Prey
To turn off the device enter your PIN and try again.
Prevents uninstall attempts by locking the phone with your Prey PIN. If a native lock pattern or code is active, it will be used instead.
As of Android 8.0, Prey needs to display a notification to run as a background app and actively track the device and its control zone triggers.
Not Available in Android 9 and up
This feature is not availabe due to Google\'s policy restrictions in this Android version
Use your fingerprint instead of your password to view the app’s Settings.
To access Prey using your fingerprint scanner
Enter thes app’s Settings menu with your password and activate the feature.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This a test report, no alerts or messages will be shown when gathering a real one.
The %1$s permission was denied, which affects Prey\'s features. Please give permission manually in the settings menu.\n\nSelect Permissions -> Enable permission
If the email entered is valid, we will send the activation link shortly.
Enabling the accessibility service for Prey allows it to block all applications before they ́re opened when the device is marked as missing.
PREY NEEDS PERMISSIONS TO COMPLETELY SECURE YOUR DEVICE
ACCESS LOCATION, FILES AND MULTIMEDIA CONTENT

DEVICE'S LOCATION
Device tracking and use of control zones for geofencing require the device location.

TAKE PICTURES AND RECORD VIDEO
The images included in evidence reports are taken with front and back cameras.

ACCESS PHOTOS, MEDIA AND FILES ON YOUR DEVICE
The File Retrieval tool needs this permission to recover files remotely from the device.
ACCESS DEVICE ADMIN PERMISSIONS\nPrey can activate extra security tools with the administrator permission, like the Remote Wipe and Lock, or the Block Uninstall setting.
OVERLAP APP SCREENS\nWhen a Remote Lock is activated, Prey utilizes this permission to display a custom screen lock over all other apps.

All of the app functionalities require you to give the permissions needed and to activate your account directly in the control panel.

None of your data is being sold or sent to third parties for any purpose. It will not be used for any purposes other than to deliver or improve the app functionalities. 

All data is sent through SSL.
Access your online panel from any place or platform, and perform security actions on your device.
Know where your lost device is and detect when it moves somewhere.
Protect your device and its data with remote security actions like Lock, Wipe, and Alarm.
Get evidence reports with pictures, screenshots, nearby WiFis, user data, and locations.
Give this device a name to identify it in Prey.
The account identification has expired or has been revoked, please contact your administrator.
Do you want to continue with the process of removing Prey permissions on this device? Remember to reboot and then uninstall.
Allows Prey to enter the app configuration using only your fingerprint.
